title: virusfonts release new 32 weight font family BOURGEOIS
content:
BOURGEOIS FONT  
+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+

FONT RELEASE: BOURGEOIS  
This clean looking sans was originally drawn in three weights for the Mori Art Museum in Japan. ( [www.mori.art.museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015060234/http:/www.mori.art.museum/ "www.mori.art.museum")), Bourgeois has been now been released as a major 32 weight family. It is not the most experimental font we have designed (it has a very light virusfonts touch to it) but it is certainly one of the most usable, well crafted and mature. We hope you will find that suitable for a number of uses, both text and display, please check the virusfonts website at [www.virusfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015060234/http:/www.virusfonts.com/ "www.virusfonts.com") for specimen sheets and pricing details.

+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+
author: virusfonts

comments.content:
